Hey! I'm putting together a "all-in-one"-module just to show our designers what is available and not, but (while using `hs watch` , CLI) I get an uploading error complaining about invalid default values on the Spacing field (taken directly from <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/module-theme-fields#spacing>)
Is anyone able to spot what's wrong about the default values from the documentation example? (beside it missing a comma in the default-padding-bottom object)

According to the documentation everything is as it should be; I'd assume the only needed values within top/bottom/left/right is the `value`
 and `units[]` properties(?).
I also changed the default values from "25" to "26" in case the "Limit" field (that is set to minimum 25) was causing issues by not including 25
